    • Constructor Detail

      • HealthPower

        public HealthPower(App app,
                   Level level,
                   Player player)
        Constructor for HealthPower class. Keeps track of each player's health and power and the GUI for them.
        Parameters:
        app - is the App object that we will pass through to allow for drawing + more implementations of the PApplet library.
        level - is the Level object which a HealthPower object belongs to.
        player - is the Player object which a HealthPower object belongs to.

    • Method Detail

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()

      • getPower

        public void setLoseHealth(boolean value)

      • getLoseHealth

        public boolean getLoseHealth()

      • drawHealthBar

        public boolean drawHealthBar()
        Draw health bar at the top of the screen.
        Returns:
        true if executed, false if otherwise.

      • displayHealthPowerText

        public boolean displayHealthPowerText()
        Display how much health and power a player has.
        Returns:
        true if executed, false if otherwise.

      • updateHealth

        public boolean updateHealth(int health)
        Update the health amount. If the health falls below the current power amount, update the power such that it is equal to the health, as the power is at most equal to the health.
        Parameters:
        health - is the health amount that we want to update our health value to.
        Returns:
        true if executed, false if otherwise.

      • decreaseHealth

        public boolean decreaseHealth(int decrease)
        Decreases the health amount. Call when a player has been hit by a projectile.
        Parameters:
        decrease - is the amount we want our health to decrease by.
        Returns:
        true if executed, false if otherwise.

      • updatePower

        public boolean updatePower(float power)
        Update the power amount. It cannot exceed the health amount.
        Parameters:
        power - is the amount of power we want to update our power to.
        Returns:
        true if excecuted, false if otherwise.

      • powerIncrease

        public boolean powerIncrease()
        Increase the power by 1.2 when we press the 'w' key.
        Returns:
        true if excecuted, false if otherwise.

      • powerDecrease

        public boolean powerDecrease()
        Decrease the power by 1.2 when we press the 's' key.
        Returns:
        true if excecuted, false if otherwise.
